head.title: Anise Hyssop Sauce for Roast Lamb

ing.item: Coarsely chopped anise hyssop leaves and flowers

directions.step:
From: arielle@bonkers.taronga.com (Stephanie da Silva)
Date: Sat, 22 Apr 1995 11:28:04 GMT In a small saucepan combine sugar, vinegar and water. Bring to a boil. Add chopped anise hyssop leaves and bring to a boil. Turn off heat and let steep for 1/2 hour. Pour through a sieve, pressing solids to extract all the liquid. Serve with roast lamb or veal.
